feed.title: Category: templates | Random thoughts | Hari KT

entry.title: Google comes with movie search for your location
entry.content: Many of you may have already heard about the movie search feature of google . Now you can search location and know the running movies in each location . You will get the time and which movie is playing in the theatere . Seems an interesting one . There is also one more interesting thing , if you are looking to create website in google pages new templates are available . So check it out and create your webpages for free .
